channel.title: Shitty drop problem
channel.description:
Hi all, i made a recolour, requested by some of my players.
But.. when you die, you don't lose the items. you just keep them all + 3 other items...
But, we DO lose any other customs. expect this whole recoloured armour set. How to fix? Does someone know?
Thanx, Langkampo.

item.title: Shitty drop problem
item.dc:creator: @langkampo langkampo
item.description:
@langkampo wrote:

It’s recoloured Saradomin armour. So why shouldnt it drop??

I’m on EvolutionX/OceanX Source, i dont know if its delta or what.

But i really need help with this…

Read full topic

item.title: Shitty drop problem
item.dc:creator: @Burkey Burkey
item.description:
@Burkey wrote:

What source are you on? Certain items are automatically protected on many sources, these may include, but are not limited to:

Fire Capes
Void Knight Armor
Rune Defenders
Fighter Torsos

In order to fix this, try searching for your death method, may be called ApplyDead(). You will most likely see

&& itemID != XXXXX somewhere in that method, delete that part and your item will drop.

Read full topic
